events.1316: Mughal Emperor Shah Jahan was born.
events.1592: ShahJahan, Mughal emperor of India,  was born at Lahore.
events.1659: Aurangzeb defeated Shah Shuja in the battle of Khawan near Allahabad.
events.1671: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj captured the 'Salher' fort from Mughals.
events.1869: Venkatesh Tirko Kulkarni, famous Kannad novelist 'Galagnath', was born.
events.1893: Paramahansa Yogananda (1893-1952), universalist Hindu, great saint, social reformer, writer and litterateur was born at Gorakhpur. He was the renaissance founder of Self Realization Fellowship (1925) in US, author of famed 'Autobiography of a Yogi' (1946), popular book globalizing India's spiritual traditions.
events.1934: Dr. Murli Manohar Manmohan Joshi was born in Delhi.
events.1941: Mansur Ali Khan Pataudi, cricketer (Nawab of Pataudi jr., Indian batsman & youngest Indian Test Captain), was born in Bhopal.
events.1948: Parthasarathy Harishchandra Sharma, cricketer (Indian batsman of the mid-70's), was born in Alwar, Rajasthan.
events.1952: John Hope Victor Alexander, Viceroy of India (1936-43), died at the age of 64.
events.1953: Andhra University celebrated its silver jubilee.
events.1955: Kumari Mamata Promileswar Banerjee was born in Calcutta (West Bengal).
events.1957: Adintrim Sales Tax Act was introduced and the Central Sales Tax Act of 1956 came into force.
events.1968: Government of India accepts the administrative reforms commission's recommendation to appoint a Lok Pal.
events.1982: C. Ramchandra (Chitalkar), famous music director, died.
events.1985: Rajiv Gandhi promises to solve the Punjab problem without yielding to 'separatist ideologies.
events.1988: India's first indigenously built 'Braille' script released short hand machine for the blind.
events.1990: Mohammad Azharuddin was made captain of Indian cricket team.
events.1992: Ravi Shastri scores 206 at SCG before being Warne's 1st cricket Test wkt.
events.1994: Tamil Nadu Assembly passes two bills making the Chief Minister, the Chancellor of all universities instead of the Governor.
events.1995: PM gives valedictory address at the 8th World Tamil Conference in Madurai.
events.1998: Laloo Yadav, RJD president, and BSP chief Kanshi Ram launch a seven-party "Jan Morcha".
events.2000: Tamil Nadu regains Subbiah Pillai Trophy one day cricket tournament.
